channel.title: ok go on voices in my head
channel.description: Recent content in ok go on voices in my head

item.title: OK Go’s new video for “The One Moment” is a stunning example of high-speed video.
item.author: cpbotha@cpbotha.net (Charl P. Botha)
item.description: The whole music video was shot with high-speed video in one single, glorious 4.2 second take, and then played back at “normal” speed to result in this mind-blowing end-product: (BTW, since when are facebook videos a thing? Fortunately, WordPress immediately understood the facebook video link I pasted and correctly embedded it.)
item.content:encoded:
The whole music video was shot with high-speed video in one single, glorious 4.2 second take, and then played back at “normal” speed to result in this mind-blowing end-product:

(BTW, since when are facebook videos a thing? Fortunately, WordPress immediately understood the facebook video link I pasted and correctly embedded it.)
